chart_description: This chart provides a summary of the PLEG (Pod Lifecycle Event Generator) relisting interval in microseconds. It helps in identifying if any issues are causing delays in PLEG's detection of pod status changes.

dimension_descriptions.0.5: The value below which 50% of the observed intervals fall. This provides a measure of the median relisting interval.
dimension_descriptions.0.9: The value below which 90% of the observed intervals fall. This helps identify the upper limit of the majority of the intervals.
dimension_descriptions.0.99: The value below which 99% of the observed intervals fall. This helps identify the extreme upper range of the intervals, useful for detecting any potential outliers in the data.
